command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.addressSpace.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.dhcpOptions.dnsServers" options="dns-servers" group="">

<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$parameters.properties.ipAllocations" options="ip-allocations" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings" options="virtual-network-peerings" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@AddressSpace_create.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg type="array<@IpamPoolPrefixAllocation_create>" var="@AddressSpace_create.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" options="ipam-pool-prefix-allocations">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings[].properties.localSubnetNames" options="local-subnet-names" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings[].properties.remoteSubnetNames" options="remote-subnet-names" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets" options="subnets" group="Subnet">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" options="application-gateway-ip-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.delegations" options="delegations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.ipAllocations" options="ip-allocations" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@IpamPoolPrefixAllocation_create>" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" options="ipam-pool-prefix-allocations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules" options="security-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes" options="destination-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_create>" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationApplicationSecurityGroups" options="destination-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges" options="destination-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceAddressPrefixes" options="source-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceApplicationSecurityGroups" options="source-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourcePortRanges" options="source-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.routeTable.properties.routes" options="routes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies" options="service-endpoint-policy" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" options="contextual-service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions" options="service-endpoint-policy-definitions" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions[].properties.serviceResources" options="service-resources" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpoints" options="service-endpoints" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpoints[].locations" options="locations">

help.short: The extended location of the virtual network.
The name of the extended location.
The type of the extended location.

<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">
<prop type="array" name="subscriptions">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@NetworkInterfaceTapConfiguration_read>" name="tapConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="securityRules">
<prop type="array" name="destinationAddressPrefixes">
<prop type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_read>" name="destinationApplicationSecurityGroups">
<prop type="array" name="destinationPortRanges">
<prop type="array" name="sourceAddressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="sourceApplicationSecurityGroups">
<prop type="array" name="sourcePortRanges">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@Subnet_read>" name="subnets">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@PrivateEndpoint_read>" name="privateEndpoints">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="resourceNavigationLinks">
<prop type="array" name="routes">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@Subnet_read>" name="subnets">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="serviceAssociationLinks">
<prop type="array" name="locations">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="contextualServiceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions">
<prop type="array" name="serviceResources">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@Subnet_read>" name="subnets">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpoints">
<prop type="array" name="locations">
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkPeerings">
<prop type="array" name="localSubnetNames">
<prop type="array" name="remoteSubnetNames">

<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="$parameters.properties.addressSpace.addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" arg="$parameters.properties.addressSpace.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations">
<prop type="array" name="dnsServers" arg="$parameters.properties.dhcpOptions.dnsServers">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_update>" name="ipAllocations" arg="$parameters.properties.ipAllocations">
<prop type="array" name="subnets" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="delegations" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.delegations">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_update>" name="ipAllocations" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.ipAllocations">
<prop type="array<@IpamPoolPrefixAllocation_update>" name="ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations">
<prop type="array" name="securityRules" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules">
<prop type="array" name="destinationAddressPrefixes" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes">
<prop type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_update>" name="destinationApplicationSecurityGroups" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationApplicationSecurityGroups">
<prop type="array" name="destinationPortRanges" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges">
<prop type="array" name="sourceAddressPrefixes" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceAddressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="sourceApplicationSecurityGroups" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceApplicationSecurityGroups">
<prop type="array" name="sourcePortRanges" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourcePortRanges">
<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.routeTable.properties.routes">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicies" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions">
<prop type="array" name="serviceResources" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions[].properties.serviceResources">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpoints" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpoints">
<prop type="array" name="locations" arg="$parameters.properties.subnets[].properties.serviceEndpoints[].locations">
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkPeerings" arg="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="@AddressSpace_update.addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array<@IpamPoolPrefixAllocation_update>" name="ipamPoolPrefixAllocations" arg="@AddressSpace_update.ipamPoolPrefixAllocations">
<prop type="array" name="localSubnetNames" arg="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings[].properties.localSubnetNames">
<prop type="array" name="remoteSubnetNames" arg="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkPeerings[].properties.remoteSubnetNames">
